data: 12 people were killed in the largest wave of Russian missile strikes since July last year.
The meeting between Trump and Zelensky lasted about 15 minutes.
Trump's special envoy met with Putin for three hours.
claims: Trump questioned Putin's interest in a peace deal.
Zelensky expressed hope for a ceasefire and lasting peace.
Trump stated that Russia and Ukraine are close to a deal.
Zelensky suggested compromises to advance peace talks.
The US has been applying more pressure on Ukraine regarding peace negotiations.
intent: To report on the recent meeting between Trump and Zelensky regarding peace talks in Ukraine and the ongoing conflict with Russia.
